players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Diana, please vote Bob with me."
Diana: "Alice, why claim D1? If you're real, you’ll be night-killed. Bob, respond: are you mafioso? Any contradictions in Alice’s info? Also, who would Charlie have suspected, and why?"
Bob: remained silent.
You: "Bob’s silence says it all. I hard-claim Detective: I checked Bob—he’s Mafia. If I’m lying, I get exposed tomorrow; if I’m truthful, we win today. Diana, lock it in: vote Bob."

Bob: "False claim. Alice is framing me because she knows Diana will sheep a confident D1 claim. If she were real, she’d have saved the check for today to avoid a NK. Diana, don’t rush—split votes or vote Alice."

Diana: "Alice, if you’re Detective, give us your Night 1 thought process: why check Bob over Charlie or me? Bob, who do you vote today and why? Also, both of you: outline tomorrow’s plan if your read is wrong."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
